form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cruz (for himself, Mr. Marshall, Mr. Sheehy, Mr. Tuberville, Mr. Budd, Mr. Schmitt, Mrs. Britt, Mr. Ricketts, Mr. Barrasso, Mr. Lee, Ms. Lummis, Mr. Risch, Mr. Tillis, Mrs. Hyde-Smith, and Mr. Hoeven) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Clean Air Act to repeal the natural gas tax.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Natural Gas Tax Repeal Act.
Section 136 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7436) (relating to methane emissions and waste reduction incentive program for petroleum and natural gas systems) is repealed.
The unobligated balance of any amounts made available under section 136 of the Clean Air Act (42 U.S.C. 7436) (as in effect on the day before the date of enactment of this Act) is rescinded.
